subject_attribute_value.subject_attribute_value_id: Unique identifier for the attribute value
subject_attribute_value.subject_id: Identifier for the associated subject or patient
subject_attribute_value.attribute_name: Name of the attribute (e.g., middle_name, date_of_birth)

case_sample.case_sample_id: Unique identifier for the case sample
case_sample.sample_type: Type of the sample (e.g., TISSUE, FLUID)
case_sample.specimen: Stores the specimen type of the sample (e.g., BLOOD, URINE, FFPE, CSF, ASCITIC FLUID, etc.)
case_sample.subject_id: Identifier for the associated subject or patient

user_master.title: Title of the user (e.g., Mr., Ms., Dr.)
user_master.name: First name of the user
